examples.example: 很荣幸能在这里与各位幸会，希望我们都能度过美好的时光。

translate.english: It is a great honor to be here to meet you all. I hope we all can have a wonderful time.

examples.example: 今天很幸运能在这里与您幸会，真是太开心了。

translate.english: It's very lucky to have the chance to meet you here today. I'm really so happy.

examples.example: 此次活动中得以幸会诸多行业精英，真是让我受益匪浅。

translate.english: It is really a great benefit to me to have the honor to meet many industry elites in this activity.
